title: Microscopic life: the world of the invisible
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Hal Kopel
brief_description: A microscopic study of the beautiful and grotesque animals and plants that can be found in a jar of ordinary pond water. Illustrates and explains the differences between microscopic plants and animals.
